posts.author: Tralalero Tralala
posts.title: fish don't pay rent
posts.content: i asked the ocean for a job and it gave me anxiety

posts.author: Bombardino Crocodillo
posts.title: woke up and chose soup
posts.content: spilled alphabet soup and summoned a demon named jason

posts.author: Trippi Troppi
posts.title: thoughts.exe crashed
posts.content: my brain buffering at 3am just to remember i left cheese on the windowsill

posts.author: Bombombini Gusini
posts.title: don’t trust the geese
posts.content: they know your sins and your search history

posts.author: Lirilì Larilà
posts.title: ghost in the fridge
posts.content: he ate all the yogurt and said 'boo lactose'

posts.author: Bobritto bandito
posts.title: just barked at a microwave
posts.content: it barked back. we’re dating now

posts.author: Tralalero Tralala
posts.title: help my fork is screaming
posts.content: it said 'stop stabbing salad it has a family'

posts.author: Bombardino Crocodillo
posts.title: no thoughts only shrimp
posts.content: shrimp in the sink. shrimp in my mind. shrimp in my taxes

posts.author: Trippi Troppi
posts.title: sleep is a conspiracy
posts.content: bed said lay down and i said perish

posts.author: Bombombini Gusini
posts.title: cup noodles is my therapist
posts.content: they said 'boil your emotions, baby'

posts.author: Lirilì Larilà
posts.title: brain doing backflips
posts.content: i sneezed and invented a new emotion

posts.author: Bobritto bandito
posts.title: ate a cloud today
posts.content: soft. chewy. tasted like 3rd grade memories

posts.author: Tralalero Tralala
posts.title: don’t microwave your dreams
posts.content: they come out soggy and sad

posts.author: Bombardino Crocodillo
posts.title: accidentally married a spoon
posts.content: we’re expecting a fork next spring

posts.author: Trippi Troppi
posts.title: socks are just foot prisons
posts.content: my toes demand freedom and pizza

posts.author: Bombombini Gusini
posts.title: wednesday is a scam
posts.content: i checked. it's actually just tuesday in a costume

posts.author: Lirilì Larilà
posts.title: i opened the fridge and saw myself
posts.content: he winked. i winked. we both screamed

posts.author: Bobritto bandito
posts.title: teeth are just mouth bones
posts.content: and bones are just spicy calcium decorations

posts.author: Tralalero Tralala
posts.title: birds know too much
posts.content: that pigeon winked at me like it pays taxes

posts.author: Bombardino Crocodillo
posts.title: the wifi spoke latin
posts.content: and summoned julius caesar through my router

posts.author: Trippi Troppi
posts.title: my phone just sighed
posts.content: it said 'bro. again?' when i opened twitter

posts.author: Bombombini Gusini
posts.title: just yelled at the moon
posts.content: it yelled back. we’re in a toxic relationship now

posts.author: Lirilì Larilà
posts.title: banana called me greg
posts.content: i answered. greg is gone now. i am greg

posts.author: Bobritto bandito
posts.title: microwave asked for a raise
posts.content: i gave it my taxes. it’s the boss now

posts.author: Tralalero Tralala
posts.title: noodle thoughts only
posts.content: brain is spaghetti, sauce is panic

posts.author: Bombardino Crocodillo
posts.title: fridge politics
posts.content: milk and ketchup had a debate. mustard won

posts.author: Trippi Troppi
posts.title: floor is made of soap
posts.content: slid into another dimension just trying to get toast

posts.author: Bombombini Gusini
posts.title: dreamt i was a powerpoint
posts.content: slide 3 was just me screaming

posts.author: Lirilì Larilà
posts.title: window keeps judging me
posts.content: i swear it smirked when i tripped on my charger

posts.author: Bobritto bandito
posts.title: tuesday smells like printer ink
posts.content: and broken promises

posts.author: Tralalero Tralala
posts.title: i googled 'how to unburn toast'
posts.content: now my toaster has a lawyer

posts.author: Bombardino Crocodillo
posts.title: bit my alarm clock
posts.content: it bit back. time is pain

posts.author: Trippi Troppi
posts.title: bought emotions on ebay
posts.content: received confusion and extra shipping charges

posts.author: Bombombini Gusini
posts.title: potato salad knows too much
posts.content: i can’t trust it. it’s watching me

posts.author: Lirilì Larilà
posts.title: became soup for 12 minutes
posts.content: therapist says i need grounding

posts.author: Bobritto bandito
posts.title: ate a USB drive
posts.content: now i dream in spreadsheets

posts.author: Tralalero Tralala
posts.title: the cheese moved
posts.content: it looked at me and whispered 'run'

posts.author: Bombardino Crocodillo
posts.title: egg conspiracy
posts.content: why are they shaped like secrets?

posts.author: Trippi Troppi
posts.title: i saw a duck in a tie
posts.content: he was late for his 3pm destruction

posts.author: Bombombini Gusini
posts.title: water bottle betrayed me
posts.content: spilled on me in front of my crush

posts.author: Lirilì Larilà
posts.title: music from the sink
posts.content: it’s jazz. the forks are vibing

posts.author: Bobritto bandito
posts.title: bread tried to escape
posts.content: caught it mid-toast. it screamed

posts.author: Tralalero Tralala
posts.title: i licked the ethernet cable
posts.content: now i speak in pings and regret

posts.author: Bombardino Crocodillo
posts.title: the sun won’t stop laughing
posts.content: i didn’t even say anything

posts.author: Trippi Troppi
posts.title: i dated a lamp once
posts.content: it was enlightening but short-circuited

posts.author: Bombombini Gusini
posts.title: lost my thoughts in the laundry
posts.content: found a sock and a revelation

posts.author: Lirilì Larilà
posts.title: keyboard is judging me
posts.content: it sighed when i typed 'asdfg' again

posts.author: Bobritto bandito
posts.title: toilet made a weird noise
posts.content: think it's mad i flushed a hotdog

posts.author: Tralalero Tralala
posts.title: brain ran away
posts.content: left a sticky note that said 'brb 😎'

posts.author: Bombardino Crocodillo
posts.title: grape told me secrets
posts.content: i know too much now. the raisins are watching
